channel.title: Making Full screen Help?

item.title: Making Full screen Help?
item.dc:creator: @riri383 riri383
item.description:
@riri383 wrote:

Hi, I’m attempting to make my game full screen but it’s kinda failing at the moment, because I don’t know how to link this script to a button?Help me please!!!

GraphicsDevice myDevice;
Window myWindow;
DisplayMode newDisplayMode;

DisplayMode oldDisplayMode = myDevice.getDisplayMode();
try {
    myDevice.setFullScreenWindow(myWindow);
    myDevice.setDisplayMode(newDisplayMode);
    ...
} finally {
    myDevice.setDisplayMode(oldDisplayMode);
    myDevice.setFullScreenWindow(null);
}

Read full topic
